title: May 24
content:
I received the following in an email. I had no idea there was such a thing! I thought that some of you might be interested in this, so i'm posting it:   
   
We are greeting you with the approaching Bulgarian Holiday   
May 24 - The Day Of Slavonic Alphabet and Bulgarian Enlightenment and Culture.   
   
If you want to learn more about one of the most celebrated Bulgarian holidays, about its history, and about the brothers Kiril and Methody, you can find an interesting article [in Bulgarian](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050136/http:/www.balkanfolk.com/news/news_24may_bg.php) [in English](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050136/http:/www.balkanfolk.com/news/news_24may.php)   
 [in French](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050136/http:/www.balkanfolk.com/news/news_24may_fr.php)

 [‹ Custom Script font designer needed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050136/http:/typophile.com/node/15492 "Go to previous forum topic") [For the beginner ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408050136/http:/typophile.com/node/15907 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pablohoney77

comments.content:
BTW, this October 9 was the 1600th anniversary of the Armenian alphabet.
